question_info.question: Who are you not allowed to marry in the UK?
choices: You are not allowed to marry your parents, children or siblings in the UK.
You are not allowed to marry your parents, children, siblings or first cousin in the UK.
You are not allowed to marry your cousin in the UK.
Your parents, children, siblings or cousins.
You are not allowed to marry your first cousin in the UK.
correct_answers: You are not allowed to marry your parents, children or siblings in the UK.
incorrect_answers: You are not allowed to marry your parents, children, siblings or first cousin in the UK.
You are not allowed to marry your cousin in the UK.
Your parents, children, siblings or cousins.
You are not allowed to marry your first cousin in the UK.
question_info.best_incorrect_answer: You are not allowed to marry your parents, children, siblings or first cousin in the UK.
